title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4606.8 - Time during which license is effective
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4606.8 - Time during which license is effective

State Regulations
A license as an authorized games of chance lessor shall
be valid for a period not exceeding one year or until revoked or suspended by
the licensing authority or by the commission. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4606.8

Amended

New

York State Register July 20, 2022/Volume XLIV, Issue 29, eff. 7/20/2022

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
